snippet: Toshiba again delayed announcing its annual financial results as new accounting errors kept it from drawing a line under Japan’s worst corporate scandal in four years.
abstract: Toshiba delays announcing annual earnings for second time, citing newly discovered accounting errors; shares dip in early trading.
lead_paragraph: Toshiba again delayed announcing its annual financial results as new accounting errors kept it from drawing a line under Japan’s worst corporate scandal in four years.

headline.main: Toshiba Delays Report on Finances Once Again
headline.print_headline: Toshiba Delays Report on Finances Once Again
